changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_block') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_block GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_block @owner_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Character_Blocks(owner_id, character_id) VALUES(@owner_id, @character_id)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_block') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_block GO
